item.title: Meta 赢得 1.68 亿美元的间谍软件大奖，怎能不令人欢欣鼓舞？
item.description:
该公司对 NSO 集团的胜利将震慑这个阴暗的行业，但不会扼杀它。【原文：

The company’s victory against NSO Group will deter this murky industry — but won’t kill it.

item.title: 欧洲购买炮弹，军火制造商财富增至三倍，达 160 亿美元
item.description: 武器制造商米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）喜欢说自己从事的是国防事业。随着欧洲大规模重整军备，事实证明这是一个有利可图的地方。【原文：Weapons maker Michal Strnad likes to say he works in the business of defense. As Europe re-arms on a massive scale, it’s proving a lucrative place to be.】

item.title: 英镑、英国富时指数期货在美英贸易协议有望达成之际上涨
item.description: 有报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将在周三晚些时候宣布美英之间的贸易协议，英镑和富时 100 指数期货因此上涨。【原文：The pound and FTSE 100 stock-index futures rallied on a report that US President Donald Trump is expected to announce a trade deal between the US and UK later Wednesday.】

item.title: 台湾不希望被美国认定为汇率操纵国
item.description: 台湾中央银行行长否认了被美国财政部贴上汇率操纵国标签的可能性。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank governor dismissed the possibility of being labeled a currency manipulator by the US Treasury.】

item.title: 投资者对地缘政治紧张局势忧心忡忡，但历史表明股市可抵御冲突
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 家族办公室 NF Trinity 将进驻纽约，拓展美国市场
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，香港企业集团南丰集团旗下的金融投资和家族办公室南丰三一计划在纽约设立办事处，以发掘在美国的投资机会。【原文：Nan Fung Trinity, the financial investment and family office arm of Hong Kong conglomerate Nan Fung Group, is planning to set up an office in New York to tap investment opportunities in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾国内生产总值增长 5.4%，即使关税影响尚未显现
item.description: 菲律宾经济在第一季度的增长速度低于预期，这凸显了政策制定者所面临的挑战，甚至在特朗普政府的贸易战震撼市场并伤害全球情绪之前就已如此。【原文：The Philippine economy expanded slower than expected in the first quarter, underscoring challenges for policymakers even before the Trump administration’s trade war rocked markets and hurt global sentiment.】

item.title: 中国 "僵尸 "超级油轮指向伊朗贸易变通办法
item.description: 在北京和华盛顿的压力下，将伊朗原油运往中国的秘密供应链正在寻找新的变通办法。【原文：After buckling under pressure from Beijing and Washington, the clandestine supply chain that carries Iranian crude to China is finding new workarounds.】

item.title: 苹果试图挽救 200 亿美元的谷歌搜索交易，称其没有必要
item.description: 苹果公司为挽救与 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌公司利润丰厚的搜索合作关系，提出了一个不同寻常的主张，称从长远来看，这项合作可能没有必要，甚至 iPhone 也可能不再使用。【原文：Apple Inc. made an unusual pitch in its bid to save a lucrative search partnership with Alphabet Inc.’s Google, saying that the deal might not be necessary in the long run and that even the iPhone may fall out of use.】

item.title: 墨西哥领导人为阿波罗的罗文推动美墨协议喝彩
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）强调美国和墨西哥之间需要建立贸易伙伴关系，这推动了一种观点，即全球贸易战可能使美国的南部邻国在不确定性中成为赢家。【原文：Mexican business leaders and executives lauded statements from Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan emphasizing the need for a trade partnership between the US and Mexico, which propelled a view that a global trade war could make the US’ southern neighbor a winner amid uncertainty.】

item.title: 韩国外汇储备因养老基金互换创五年新低
item.description: 截至 4 月底，韩国的外汇储备达到 4,046.7 亿美元，创下五年来的新低，部分原因是国民年金局扩大了与韩国银行的互换协议。【原文：South Korea’s foreign exchange reserves reached a five-year low to $404.67 billion at the end of April, partly attributable to the National Pension Service’s expanded swap agreements with the Bank of Korea.】

item.title: 亚洲涂料在季度财报发布前收到创纪录的抛售电话
item.description: 在印度最大的涂料生产商发布业绩之前，分析师们对其看跌的程度达到了有史以来最高，因为竞争对手正在蚕食其市场份额。【原文：Analysts are the most bearish ever on India’s largest paint maker before its results, as competitors chip away its market share.】

item.title: 威利斯在奥尔辞职前询问新西兰央行利率和会议频率
item.description: 根据《官方信息法》（Official Information Act）获得的文件显示，新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）要求央行解释为何在行长阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）突然辞职的前一周计划将利率维持在限制性水平。【原文：New Zealand Minister of Finance Nicola Willis asked the central bank to explain why it planned to keep interest rates at a restrictive level in the week prior to the sudden resignation of Governor Adrian Orr, documents obtained under the Official Information Act show.】

item.title: 特朗普以 "大国 "预告重大贸易声明
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他计划于周四召开新闻发布会，讨论 "与一个备受尊敬的大国代表达成的重大贸易协议"。【原文：President Donald Trump said he plans to hold a news conference Thursday to discuss “a MAJOR TRADE DEAL WITH REPRESENTATIVES OF A BIG, AND HIGHLY RESPECTED, COUNTRY.”】

item.title: 英国与印度签署贸易示范协议，JLR、帝亚吉欧成为赢家之一
item.description: 作为全面贸易协定的一部分，印度决定削减从英国制造的汽车到威士忌的关税，这可能会产生一批赢家，其中包括捷豹路虎和帝亚吉欧集团。【原文：India’s decision to slash tariffs on UK-made cars to whiskey as part of a sweeping trade pact could create a line of winners, including Jaguar Land Rover and Diageo Plc.】

item.title: 香港致力于提升形象以吸引海外游客
item.description: 香港旅游局局长表示，香港正在努力改变因多年动荡而受损的形象，重新成为亚洲活动中心，并开始吸引更多中国大陆以外的国际游客。【原文：Hong Kong’s efforts to overhaul an image dented by years of turbulence and reestablish itself as an Asian events hub are starting to lure more international visitors beyond mainland China, the city’s tourism chief said.】

item.title: 供应压力逼近，韩国债券反弹面临障碍
item.description: 韩国债券长达一年之久的涨势正面临减速，因为人们越来越担心，在下个月的总统投票之后，再次加大财政刺激力度会进一步增加政府借贷。【原文：A year-long rally in South Korean bonds is facing a speed bump, as concerns grow that another ramp-up in fiscal stimulus after next month’s presidential vote would further increase government borrowing.】

item.title: 特朗普称将在中国贸易谈判中提高黎明的地位
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将在与中国的贸易谈判中提出前媒体大亨黎智英的案件，此举很可能在双方会晤前几天激怒中国政府。【原文：President Donald Trump said he will raise the case of ex-media mogul Jimmy Lai as part of trade talks with China, a move likely to antagonize Beijing just days before the two sides meet.】

item.title: 百威啤酒亚太区持续受到中国需求疲软的影响
item.description: 由于中国消费需求疲软，啤酒行业继续受到打击，百威啤酒亚太有限公司第一季度利润持续下滑。【原文：Budweiser Brewing Co APAC Ltd.’s first-quarter profit saw a continued slump, as the beer sector continued to be battered by weak consumer demand in China.】

item.title: 苹果公司请求法院暂停将颠覆其美国应用程序商店业务的命令
item.description: 苹果公司正在寻求推迟一项法院命令，该命令要求苹果公司允许 App Store 开发者引导用户到网络上购买应用内物品而无需支付佣金，从而减少了一个利润丰厚的收入来源。【原文：Apple Inc. is seeking to delay a court order that requires the company to let App Store developers steer users to the web to purchase in-app items without paying a commission, reducing a lucrative source of revenue.】

item.title: 黄金周三受鲍威尔利率言论影响下跌后攀升
item.description: 美联储主席鲍威尔表示，尽管贸易战存在不确定性，但央行并不急于降息。【原文：Gold climbed after tumbling on Wednesday as the Federal Reserve held interest rates, and Chair Jerome Powell said the central bank isn’t in a rush to cut despite trade-war uncertainty.】

item.title: 亚洲债券对国债反弹的敏感度高于对国债下跌的敏感度
item.description: 根据彭博社的分析，亚洲新兴债券往往会受到国债反弹的支撑，不容易受到国债下跌的影响。【原文：Emerging Asian bonds tend to be supported by rallies in Treasuries, and are less vulnerable to their losses, based on a Bloomberg analysis.】

item.title: 台币惊人反弹给科技和保险公司带来麻烦
item.description: 台币飙升加剧了人们对作为全球科技供应链中坚力量的本地企业的竞争力和盈利前景的担忧。【原文：A surging Taiwan dollar is aggravating concerns about the competitiveness and earnings prospects of local firms that form the backbone of global tech supply chains.】

item.title: 磐研亚洲获 2.5 亿美元私募基金首笔关闭资金
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的磐研亚洲是风险投资公司 GGV Capital 旗下的亚洲业务品牌，已为其私人信贷战略的首次收尾获得超过 2.5 亿美元的锚定承诺。【原文：Singapore-based Granite Asia, the re-branded Asian business of venture capital firm GGV Capital, has secured over $250 million in anchor commitments for the first close of its private credit strategy.】

item.title: 市场关注中美贸易谈判，石油保持跌势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的言论凸显了官员们在达成可能的协议方面所面临的困难。【原文：Oil held a loss ahead of trade talks between the US and China, with comments from President Donald Trump highlighting the difficult path officials face reaching a possible agreement.】

item.title: NTT 拟 200 亿美元要约收购 NTT 数据公司，打造人工智能支点
item.description: 日本电信电话公司（Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp）计划将 NTT Data Group Corp.【原文：Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp. plans to make NTT Data Group Corp. a wholly-owned subsidiary, a move geared at making AI central to the telecom giant’s sprawling operations.】

item.title: Switch 2关税问题考验任天堂股价涨幅纪录
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）破纪录的股价涨势可能在周四面临现实的考验，因为这家娱乐业巨头正试图向投资者保证，尽管美国征收关税，其销售前景依然看好。【原文：Nintendo Co.’s record-breaking stock rally may face a reality check on Thursday as the entertainment giant tries to reassure investors of its sales outlook despite US tariffs.】

item.title: 房产中介称英国房屋销售指数创 2023 年以来新低
item.description: 在房产税上调和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战导致购房者纷纷躲避之后，一项受到密切关注的英国住房市场指标骤降至近两年来的最低水平。【原文：A closely watched indicator of the UK housing market plunged to the lowest level in almost two years after a property tax increase and Donald Trump’s trade war sent buyers into hiding.】

item.title: 美国关税给经济增长带来风险，英国央行将转向鸽派
item.description: 由于美国贸易战令经济增长前景暗淡，预计英国央行将于周四将利率下调四分之一个百分点，并可能发出6月份可能再次降息的信号，这有可能使央行自2009年以来首次连续降息。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point Thursday and may signal that another move is likely in June, potentially putting the central bank on course for its first back-to-back reductions since 2009 as the US trade war darkens the outlook for growth.】

item.title: 斯塔默承诺英国工人将从军费增长中获益
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，英国工人将从英国增加军费开支的计划中受益，因为英国政府正试图说服心存疑虑和不满的选民相信增加国防开支的好处。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer said British workers would benefit from the UK’s plans to boost military spending, as his government tries to convince a skeptical and disgruntled electorate of the merits of increased outlays on defense.】
